item.title: Page 17 - Drummer Girl
item.description:
Page 17 - Drummer Girl

The girl sitting at the table next to me just played drums for one of the songs. The bartender had just introduced her as a drummer, and the band allowed her to play. She knew the bartender because she had been at the bar last night with her family.

item.title: Page 32 - Examples of Quantum Sensing
item.description:
Page 32 - Examples of Quantum Sensing

You already sense parallel universes without realizing it. One of the most common ways is when you meet someone for the first time and feel like you know them somehow. This is often associated with a feeling that the two of you must have known each other in "another life".

item.title: Page 33 -Imagining 3+3=6 dimensions
item.description:
Page 33 -Imagining 3+3=6 dimensions

We are very well suited to imagine three dimensions because our world as we sense it is a three-dimensional space. You may remember learning about Cartesian coordinates in three dimensions, where any point in 3D space is represented by a coordinate (x, y, z). Now let's imagine that instead of each point representing a point...

item.title: Page 35 - Quantum Sensing the Future - This is HARD!
item.description:
Page 35 - Quantum Sensing the Future - This is HARD!

If you notice the dates, five days have passed here while I have been attempting to quantum sense your thoughts. I'm not sure why I'm having trouble, other than it's easier said than done. I think I know what I need to do different. One thing I realize is this will take a while -...

item.title: Page 34 - Who are you? Quantum Sensing into the Future
item.description:
Page 34 - Who are you? Quantum Sensing into the Future

I asked my uncle Kirk to read the prior 33 pages, which you have now read if you're reading in order. I'm wondering now about you ... who are you? Can I, in the present moment of writing this page, sense your thoughts in your present moment of reading this page?

item.title: Page 31 - Is Anything Possible?
item.description:
Page 31 - Is Anything Possible?

I was asked yesterday if anything is possible. To answer this question, I considered two possible interpretations: Is anything possible in the set of classical futures which are connected to the classical now? Is anything possible in the set of quantum futures which are connected to the quantum now?

item.title: Page 37 - Should I Stay or Should I Go Now?
item.description:
Page 37 - Should I Stay or Should I Go Now?

Should I Stay or Should I Go Now? This is a question that can affect your futures. Whether you are on a first date, a last date, or thinking of one more drink, how you answer, and more importantly how you actually act, has universe opening possibilities - and universe closing possibilities.

item.title: Page 36 - What question do you want to answer?
item.description:
Page 36 - What question do you want to answer?

The type of question I can help you with is of the form "Should I ...?". Questions such as "Will I ...?" or "How do I ...?" can be generally answered by "Yes you will in some universes and no you won't in others" and by "You need to use your free will and understanding...

item.title: Page 42 - Eulinda, the Coach Driver
item.description:
Page 42 - Eulinda, the Coach Driver

This morning I was hesitant as I boarded the bus to work. I was the only one getting on the bus and it was empty. Eulinda, the coach driver, greeted me with a big smile and reassured me that I was on the right bus. There was a second bus ten minutes behind her which...

item.title: Page 41 - The Opera Singer
item.description:
Page 41 - The Opera Singer

Continue meditating in the back of your mind as I tell you about the opera singer I met last night. He lives on the same floor as my friend who's place I'm staying at this week in SF. He showed me his place, which was fabulously decorated.
